short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Your AI-Powered Assistant for Seamless Web Browsing with LLMs such as GPT, Gemini, Claude, Llama, and Qwen.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
askone.ai is a browser extension based on large AI models that helps you quickly access relevant knowledge and information while browsing the web.

While browsing, users can interact with LLMs to quickly get related knowledge and information about the content on the webpage. The functions supported by askone.ai include:

Extracting keywords from content;
Generating summaries of content;
Translating content;
Generating questions related to the content;
Engaging in dialogue related to the content;

All our features are designed around the content you are interested in, providing you with a simple yet effective tool to assist you in browsing any webpage.

askone.ai users DO NOT need to:

Switch between applications or windows.
Switch between AI providers.
Switch between AI models.
Specify your preferences and expectations, such as language, quantity, content, etc.
Copy and paste.

askone.ai users CAN:

Enable or disable each feature at any time.
Choose the same or different AI providers and AI models for each feature.
Modify the parameters for each feature at any time.
Quickly access features through hotkeys or mouse clicks.

In summary, askone.ai is a browser extension that simplifies the process of using large AI models and enhances user productivity. We aim to provide users with a more convenient experience when using AI models, allowing them to focus more on their work and studies.

Additionally, we are open to user feedback and suggestions to continuously improve our products and services.
